project.objective: Main objective of the action is improving the innovation management capacity of two SME target groups: (1) Beneficiaries of the SME Instrument by provision of the specialised Key Account Management services, and (2) SMEs with significant innovation activities and a high potential for internationalisation through the targeted Enhancing the innovation management services. The proposed action will implement 54 seven-day service packages during the pilot action in 2017-2018.
project.title: Establishing services enhancing the innovation management capacity of the Slovak SMEs in the Enterprise Europe Network in 2017-2018
